meanings.definition: Articles used for making and serving tea.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new set of teaware for our tea party.
meanings.sent2: The teaware on the shelf caught my eye with its colorful designs.
meanings.sent3: The teaware decided to have a party while we were away.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of teaware was a treasure trove of memories.
meanings.sent5: The delicate teaware clinked softly as she poured the tea.

meanings.definition: The collective term for items such as teapots, cups, and saucers used in the preparation and consumption of tea.
meanings.sent1: We carefully arranged the teaware on the table before the guests arrived.
meanings.sent2: The antique teaware set was passed down through generations in the family.
meanings.sent3: The teaware in the cupboard whispered secrets to each other at night.
meanings.sent4: The teaware gleamed in the sunlight, reflecting years of use and care.
meanings.sent5: The teaware collection was a beautiful sight, showcasing different styles and eras.
